title: Using blessed sanctuaries like Haram Kabah Umrah & Good deeds as Waseela 2 make dua Assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign Affliction that is affecting a certain person or in other words can one end you know go to umrah and then use it as a tawasu for Allah to lift the Affliction or would that be considered an innovation foreign so the question is can I go to Haram and make Dua so Allah that would uplift my whatever Calamity I'm suffering from or can I make umrah and after finishing the umrah ask Allah using the Wasilla of my umrah saying that oh Allah I have performed umrah and I ask you with this umrah that I have presented which is a good deed of mine specifically for yours sincerely to you that you uplift This calamity that had before uh befallen upon me is this permissible the answer is yes there's no problem in using your good deeds as a Wasilla there's no problem in choosing a blessed Sanctuary like Mecca like al-haram like al-kaba or doing it through the tawaf which or the sari which is highly advisable to do uh ask Allah for such things Knows Best
